sql.trim: a.id AS "id", a.code AS "code", a.name AS "name", a.company_id AS "companyId", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag",

mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tfam_supplier a
1=1 AND a.id > 0 AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
select a.id AS "id", a.code AS "code", a.name AS "name" FROM tfam_supplier a WHERE a.name = #{producerName} and a.company_id = #{companyId} and a.del_flag = 0 limit 1
